blogPost.excerpt: SST (Serverless Stack) is a framework that makes it easy to build serverless apps. It features: -- - A Live Lambda Development environment - Zero-config support for ES and TypeScript - Higher-level constructs designed for serverless
blogPost.body: SST (Serverless Stack) is a framework that makes it easy to build serverless apps. It features: -- - A Live Lambda Development environment - Zero-config support for ES and TypeScript - Higher-level constructs designed for serverless
blogPost.title: SST - Work on your serverless apps live
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: SST(Serverless Stack)是一个可以轻松构建无服务器应用的框架。它的特点是
localize.tagline: 在您的无服务器应用程序上实时工作

localize.description: SST(Serverless Stack)是一個可以輕鬆構建無服務器應用的框架。它的特點是
localize.tagline: 在您的無服務器應用程序上實時工作

previous.excerpt: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
previous.title: Buffelist - Content link listing platform to share useful content links

localize.description: Buffelist是一个URL列表平台，通过让人们达到别人的内容建议，来达到互联网上的优质内容。你也可以通过创建你的列表来分享你的内容建议。简单来说，Buffelist是一个社交书签平台。
localize.tagline: 内容链接列表平台，分享有用的内容链接

localize.description: Buffelist是一個URL列表平臺，通過讓人們達到別人的內容建議，來達到互聯網上的優質內容。你也可以通過創建你的列表來分享你的內容建議。簡單來說，Buffelist是一個社交書籤平臺。
localize.tagline: 內容鏈接列表平臺，分享有用的內容鏈接

next.excerpt: Whether you’re a seasoned designer or just starting out, great tools are always welcome. That’s why we've created the Starter pack for designers. This pack is the best way to get ready for your next design tasks.
next.title: Starter Pack by Craftwork - Bundle of wireframes, UI kits, templates, and 3D graphics

localize.description: 无论你是一个经验丰富的设计师还是刚刚开始，伟大的工具总是受欢迎。这就是为什么我们为设计师创建了入门包。这个包是为您的下一个设计任务做好准备的最佳方式。
localize.tagline: 线框、UI套件、模板和3D图形的捆绑。

localize.description: 無論你是一個經驗豐富的設計師還是剛剛開始，偉大的工具總是受歡迎。這就是爲什麼我們爲設計師創建了入門包。這個包是爲您的下一個設計任務做好準備的最佳方式。
localize.tagline: 線框、UI套件、模板和3D圖形的捆綁。
